title: godoc to turn URLs in inline docs into anchor tags
body:
It would be nice that if godoc encounters a URL in the documentation, it turns 
it into an HTML link.

For example, in the documentation for goinstall:
  http://golang.org/cmd/goinstall/
there is a reference to http://godashboard.appspot.com/packages, but it is 
not displayed as a link.
